text: Mario Gabriele Andretti (born February 28, 1940) is a retired racecar driver. He won the 1969 Indianapolis 500, the 1978 Formula One championship and won the 1967 Daytona 500. He is called the most successful American racecar driver. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American racecar drivers Category:Formula One drivers Category:IndyCar Series drivers Category:People from Istria
title: Mario Andretti
